official-title.#text:
To amend title 11 of the United States Code to require
		  the public disclosure by trusts established under section 524(g) of such title,
		  of quarterly reports that contain detailed information regarding the receipt
		  and disposition of claims for injuries based on exposure to asbestos; and for
		  other purposes.
